+ Wiki Word History

WikidPad maintains a history of the WikiPages you have visited.

You can view this history by pressing [Ctrl-H].

To go back in the history press [Ctrl-Alt-Left] arrow.
To go forward in the history press [Ctrl-Alt-Right] arrow.

To view the history window with the previous word automatically selected press [Ctrl-Alt-Up] arrow.

To view the history window with the next word automatically selected press [Ctrl-Alt-Down] arrow.
